document.full_text: the severe drought ravaging texas and other parts of the u.s. southwest is getting worse, weather experts said thursday, and little respite is in sight for farmers, ranchers and others whose livelihoods and properties are suffering.
document.title: drought worsens in southwest as floods hit midwest
lines_and_colors: the severe drought ravaging texas and other parts of the u.s. southwest is getting worse, weather experts said thursday, and little respite is in sight for farmers, ranchers and others whose livelihoods and properties are suffering.
